#include<cstdio>
#include<iostream>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	string str;
	cin>>str;
	int c =0,i;
	int n = str.length();
	if(n<5)
	{
		cout<<"NO"<<"\n";
	}
	else
	{
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			if(isupper(str[i]))
			{
				c++;
				break;
			}
		}
			for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			if(islower(str[i]))
			{
				c++;
				break;
			}
		}
			for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			if(isdigit(str[i]))
			{
				c++;
				break;
			}
		}
			for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			if(str[i]=='_' || str[i]=='.' || str[i]==',' || str[i]=='?' || str[i]=='!')
			{
			
			}
		}
		if(c==3)
		{
			cout<<"YES"<<"\n";
		}
		else
		{
			cout<<"NO"<<"\n";
		}
	}
}
